name: The Little Drummer Girl
tagline: An American Actress with a penchant for lying is forceably recruited by Mosad, the Israeli intelligence agency to trap a Palestinian bomber, by pretending to be the girlfriend of his dead brother.

name: House II: The Second Story
tagline: The new owner of a sinister house gets involved with reanimated corpses and demons searching for an ancient Aztec skull with magic powers.

name: Vampire Academy
tagline: Rose Hathaway is a Dhampir, half human-half vampire, a guardian of the Moroi, peaceful, mortal vampires living discreetly within our world. Her calling is to protect the Moroi from bloodthirsty, immortal Vampires, the Strigoi.

name: The Best of Times
tagline: A small-town loser determines to have one more shot at the big time by winning a football game.

name: Slither
tagline: A small town is taken over by an alien plague, turning residents into zombies and all forms of mutant monsters.

name: Sirens
tagline: When a painting is termed blasphemous, a young minister and his wife visit the artist... and the three sexually playful models living with him.

name: In Bruges
tagline: Guilt-stricken after a job gone wrong, hitman Ray and his partner await orders from their ruthless boss in Bruges, Belgium, the last place in the world Ray wants to be.

name: Enemies: A Love Story
tagline: A ghostwriter finds himself romantically involved with his current wife, a married woman and his long-vanished wife.

name: The Return
tagline: Joanna Mills, a traveling business woman, begins having nightmares of a murder that occurred 15 years ago. Soon she is drawn to an old farmhouse, where the murder took place.

name: Being Julia
tagline: Set in '30s London, the film involves stage actors and their experiences with love and revenge.

name: The Cook, the Thief, His Wife & Her Lover
tagline: The wife of an oafish restaurant owner becomes bored with her husband and considers an affair with a regular patron.

name: Disorganized Crime
tagline: Career criminal Frank plans a bank heist and sends for his buddies to help pull the job. Before his buddies arrive, he's caught, forcing his cohorts to pull the job alone. Frank soon escapes, setting off a search by the bumbling cops.

name: A New Life
tagline: After a middle-aged couple divorces, they must each enter the frightening but funny world of blind dates and new relationships.

name: Bad Words
tagline: A spelling bee loser sets out to exact revenge by finding a loophole and attempting to win as an adult.

name: Tupac: Resurrection
tagline: Home movies, photographs, and recited poetry illustrate the life of Tupac Shakur, one of the most beloved, revolutionary, and volatile hip-hop MCs of all time.

name: The Collector
tagline: Desperate to repay his debt to his ex-wife, an ex-con plots a heist at his new employer's country home, unaware that a second criminal has also targeted the property, and rigged it with a series of deadly traps.

name: Laugh at My Pain
tagline: Experience the show that quickly became a national phenomenon. Get an up-close and personal look at Kevin Hart back in Philly where he began his journey to become one of the funniest comedians of all time. You will laugh 'til it hurts!

name: Sarah's Key
tagline: In modern-day Paris, a journalist finds her life becoming entwined with a young girl whose family was torn apart during the notorious Vel' d'Hiv Roundup in 1942.

name: Surviving the Game
tagline: A homeless man is hired as a survival guide for a group of wealthy businessmen on a hunting trip in the mountains, unaware that they are killers who hunt humans for sport, and that he is their new prey.

name: The Imaginarium of Doctor Parnassus
tagline: A traveling theater company gives its audience much more than they were expecting.

name: The Order

production.name: N1 European Film Produktions GmbH & Co. KG

tagline: A young priest is sent to Rome to investigate the troubling death of the head of his order.

name: Losing Isaiah
tagline: The natural and adoptive mothers of a young boy are involved in a bitter, controversial custody battle.

name: Meet Me in St. Louis
tagline: In the year before the 1904 St Louis World's Fair, the four Smith daughters learn lessons of life and love, even as they prepare for a reluctant move to New York.

name: Over Her Dead Body
tagline: A ghost tries to sabotage her former boyfriend's current relationship with a psychic.

name: City of God
tagline: Two boys growing up in a violent neighborhood of Rio de Janeiro take different paths: one becomes a photographer, the other a drug dealer.

name: Promised Land
tagline: A salesman for a natural gas company experiences life-changing events after arriving in a small town, where his corporation wants to tap into the available resources.

name: El cantante
tagline: The life story of Hector Lavoe who started the salsa movement in 1975 and brought it to the United States.

name: Damage
tagline: A member of Parliament falls passionately in love with his son's fiancée despite the dangers of discovery.

name: Proof
tagline: The daughter of a brilliant but mentally disturbed mathematician, recently deceased, tries to come to grips with her possible inheritance: his insanity. Complicating matters are one of her father's ex-students who wants to search through his papers and her estranged sister who shows up to help settle his affairs.

name: Dolphins and Whales 3D: Tribes of the Ocean
Krippendorf's Tribe
tagline: An anthropologist creates a fictitious lost New Guinea tribe using his family members to cover-up for his mis-use of grant moneys.

name: The Amazing Panda Adventure
tagline: A young American boy visiting in China helps his zoologist father rescue a panda cub from unscrupulous poachers and save a panda reserve from officious bureaucrats.

name: Clean Slate
tagline: A private eye who has amnesia must go to court about a kingpin's murder.

name: Nothing Like the Holidays
tagline: A Puerto Rican family living in the area of Humboldt Park in west Chicago face what may be their last Christmas together.

name: Barney's Version
tagline: The picaresque and touching story of the politically incorrect, fully lived life of the impulsive, irascible and fearlessly blunt Barney Panofsky.

name: Expelled: No Intelligence Allowed
tagline: Ben Stein examines the issue of academic freedom and decides that there is none when it comes to the debate over intelligent design.

name: The Curse of the Jade Scorpion
tagline: An insurance investigator and an efficency expert who hate each other are both hypnotized by a crooked hypnotist with a jade scorpion into stealing jewels.

name: The Man Who Wasn't There
tagline: A laconic, chain-smoking barber blackmails his wife's boss and lover for money to invest in dry cleaning, but his plan goes terribly wrong.

name: Martian Child
tagline: A science-fiction writer, recently widowed, considers whether to adopt a hyper-imaginative 6-year-old abandoned and socially rejected boy who says he's really from Mars.

name: A Good Year
tagline: A British investment broker inherits his uncle's chateau and vineyard in Provence, where he spent much of his childhood. He discovers a new laid-back lifestyle as he tries to renovate the estate to be sold.

name: Cyrus
tagline: A divorced guy meets the woman of his dreams. Then he meets her son.

name: Bushwhacked
tagline: On the run from authorities, a sleazy courier poses as a scout leader on a camping trip. But he has no idea what he's in for when he has to lead a group of kids.

name: Taking Woodstock
tagline: A man working at his parents' motel in the Catskills inadvertently sets in motion the generation-defining concert in the summer of 1969.

name: Harley Davidson and the Marlboro Man
Maximum Overdrive
tagline: A group of people try to survive when machines start to come alive and become homicidal.

name: Kids
tagline: A day in the life of a group of teens as they travel around New York City skating, drinking, smoking, and deflowering virgins.

name: Sprung! The Magic Roundabout
tagline: A group of friends embark on a dangerous journey in an effort to imprison their oppressor -- the evil wizard ZeeBad.

name: Clifford

production.name: Morra, Brezner, Steinberg and Tenenbaum Entertainment (MBST)

tagline: Clifford is a ten-year-old troublemaker, who puts not only his parents through hell, but also his uncle with whom his parents have discarded him to.

name: Ironweed
tagline: A schizophrenic drifter spends Halloween in his home town after returning there for the first time in decades.

name: Paranoia
tagline: An entry-level employee at a powerful corporation finds himself occupying a corner office, but at a dangerous price: he must spy on his boss's old mentor to secure for him a multi-billion dollar advantage.

name: It Runs in the Family
tagline: This is the story of a dysfunctional New York family, and their attempts to reconcile.

name: Witchboard
tagline: A woman (Kitaen) finds an interest in her friend Brandon's Ouija Board when he brings it by her party.

name: The Squid and the Whale
tagline: Based on the true childhood experiences of Noah Baumbach and his brother, The Squid and the Whale tells the touching story of two young boys dealing with their parents' divorce in Brooklyn in the 1980s.

name: The Crucible
tagline: A Salem woman accuses her ex-lover's wife of witchcraft.

name: Alice
tagline: A spoiled Manhattan housewife re-evaluates her life after visiting a Chinatown healer.

name: Bones
tagline: Over 20 years after his death by a gunshot, Jimmy Bones comes back as a ghost to wreak revenge on those who killed him and to clean up his neighborhood.

name: Who's That Girl
tagline: An uptight New York tax lawyer gets his life turned upside down, all in a single day, when he's asked to escort a feisty and free-spirited female ex-convict whom asks him to help prove her innocence of her crime.

name: Eat Drink Man Woman
tagline: A senior chef lives with his three grown daughters; the middle one finds her future plans affected by unexpected events and the life changes of the other household members.

name: Outside Providence
tagline: After one too many run ins with the law, a punk teenager from a working class background is sent to prep school by his frustrated dad, and learns a thing or two.

name: Babies
tagline: A look at one year in the life of four babies from around the world, from Mongolia to Namibia to San Francisco to Tokyo.

name: Lorenzo's Oil
tagline: A boy develops a disease so rare that nobody is working on a cure, so his father decides to learn all about it and tackle the problem himself.

name: Phantasm II
tagline: Mike, now released from a psychiatric hospital, continues his journey to stop the evil Tall Man from his grim work.

name: Machete Kills
tagline: The U.S. government recruits Machete to battle his way through Mexico in order to take down an arms dealer who looks to launch a weapon into space.

name: Run Lola Run
tagline: A young woman in Germany has twenty minutes to find and bring 100,000 Deutschmarks to her boyfriend before he robs a supermarket.

name: Searching for Bobby Fischer
tagline: A prepubescent chess prodigy refuses to harden himself in order to become a champion like the famous but unlikable Bobby Fischer.

name: Big Trouble
tagline: The lives of several Miami denizens, from ad agents to gunrunners to street thugs to law enforcement to school-children, intersect with humorous and dangerous results.

name: Friends with Kids
tagline: Two best friends decide to have a child together while keeping their relationship platonic, so they can avoid the toll kids can take on romantic relationships.

name: Rush
tagline: Two small town Texas cops go undercover to catch a major drug dealer and are sucked into the drug culture, compromising their assignment.

name: B*A*P*S
tagline: Two tacky homegirls move to L.A. to become dancers; instead they scam a dying millionaire but eventually become B*A*P*S (Black American Princesses).

name: I Know Who Killed Me
tagline: A young girl who was missing reappears, but she claims to be someone else entirely.

name: All the King's Men
tagline: Based on the Robert Penn Warren novel. The life of populist Southerner Willie Stark, a political creature loosely based on Governor Huey Long of Louisiana.

name: Mulholland Dr.
tagline: After a car wreck on the winding Mulholland Drive renders a woman amnesiac, she and a perky Hollywood-hopeful search for clues and answers across Los Angeles in a twisting venture beyond dreams and reality.

name: The Big Year
tagline: Two bird enthusiasts try to defeat the cocky, cutthroat world record holder in a year-long bird-spotting competition.

name: The Name of the Rose
tagline: An intellectually nonconformist monk investigates a series of mysterious deaths in an isolated abbey.

name: 1492: Conquest of Paradise
tagline: Christopher Columbus' discovery of the Americas and the effect this has on the indigenous people.
